page.title: 11Shanklin in 2085
page.content: I think that Shanklin will be very different in 2085.I think that the shops will be bigger and that one shop will sell everything. I expect more of the cliff above Horseledge Point and Luccombe Bay will have fallen into the sea. Another church may be built with a very modern steeple. This school,Shanklin C.E.Primary, will probably still be here, but there will be many more computers and calculators. I do not think they will use the school bell or whistles any more. Children will use typewriters rather than pencils and the secretary might use a computer with a printer.
